page.title: 06ASHWELLTHORPE VILLAGE CHURCH
page.content: {All Saints Church}is part of Wrening- ham Group comprising 7 churches admin -istered by 2 clergy,1 deaconess & 1 lay-reader.Services are held each Sunday covering the whole spectrum of evangelical ministry. The family and informal services attract 40 people & traditional prayer book services 20 or less.Midweek fellowship & Sundayschool are catered for too.Pathfinders for 10 -15 yr.old children meet weekly in the Village Hall.The church is financed by direct,or covenanted,giving & fund- raising with average yearly income be- ing{Â£5500,}accounting for a Diocesan Quota of{Â£1840,}insurances,Group exp- enses,general upkeep,minor & structur- al repairs & good causes.In{the grave} {yard}the oldest stone is 1706 to Kemp & it has stones to village families, e.g.BERNERS-past major landowners; HUGGIN-clockmakers; & COLMAN.
